list.name: commit
list.query: SELECT * FROM events WHERE event = 'UI_COMMIT_COMPLETED' AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT last("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_1sec_octets")*8 AS "IN", last("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_1sec_octets")*8 AS "OUT" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_pkts"), 1s) AS "IN", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_pkts"), 1s) AS "OUT" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_error") AS "out-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_discards") AS "in-discards", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_errors") AS "in-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_fifo_errors") AS "in-fifo-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_frame_errors") AS "in-frame-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2_mismatch_timeouts") AS "in-l2-mismatch-timeouts", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l2chan_errors") AS "in-l2chan-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_l3_incompletes") AS "in-l3-incompletes", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_qdrops") AS "in-qdrops", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_resource_errors") AS "in-resource-errors", mean("interface_stats.ingress_errors.if_in_runts") AS "in-runts" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_queue_info.bytes"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_queue_info.packets"), 1s) FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

SELECT "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.cur_buffer_occupancy" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name"

SELECT "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.avg_buffer_occupancy" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name"

SELECT "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.peak_buffer_occupancy" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" =~ /^$queue$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "device", "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number", "interface_stats.if_name"

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.ingress_stats.if_octets"), 1s)*8 AS "IN", non_negative_derivative(mean("interface_stats.egress_stats.if_octets"), 1s)*8 AS "OUT" FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WHERE "device" =~ /^$host_regex/ AND "interface_stats.if_name" =~ /^$if_name$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "device", "interface_stats.if_name" fill(null)

list.name: if_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WITH KEY = "interface_stats.if_name" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/

list.name: queue
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "juniperNetworks.jnpr_interface_ext" WITH KEY = "interface_stats.egress_queue_info.queue_number" WHERE "device" =~ /$host_regex/
